author: Stan Choe
title: Stocks rise worldwide, lifted by hopes for virus progress - The Associated Press
description: Stocks rise worldwide, lifted by hopes for virus progress The Associated Press Asian markets climb on China economic data, Wall Street’s rally MarketWatch Wall Street futures skyrocket Friday WTHR Stocks end higher as Amazon, Netflix pull away from pack The D…
content:
NEW YORK (AP) Stocks around the world rose on Friday as investors latched onto strands of hope about progress in the fight against the coronavirus. 
The S&P 500 was up 1.3% in midday trading, though the gains faded a bit from the start. It followed up on… [+4682 chars]
